ygData.subject: Re: Enchanter Nerf Protest.
ygData.msgSnippet: All Servers? We do in pvp too? ... === The Wanderer May The Wanderers Protect You _____________________________________________________________ Do You Yahoo!?
ygData.messageBody:
All Servers? We do in pvp too?

--- Scott Pflanzer <pflanzer@...> wrote:
> From: pflanzer@... (Scott Pflanzer)
>
> Now here is an Idea! a in game strike!
>
> CatsEye543@... wrote:
>
> > From: CatsEye543@...
> >
> > I agree, I think that we should all assemble on
> one day, in one area. Then we
> > petition for a GM. While we wait, we send alot of
> FEEDBACK reports, asking
> > Verant to finally balance the enchanter. When the
> GM comes, he/she will see
> > that we are serious (hopefully). Tell me what you
> think.
> >
> >
>
------------------------------------------------------------------------
> > How many communities do you think join ONElist
> each day?
> > http://www.onelist.com
> > More than 1,000! Create yours now!
>
